duties_responsibilities.duty: Works as part of a team to manufacture and package medical device instruments and components while maintaining product quality and optimal product flow.
Follows written procedures and verbal instruction for the assigned production operations that are required in the manufacturing and packaging of medical devices.
Participate in cross-training programs as required by Team Captain / Coordinator.
Upholds established lean manufacturing principles and tools used on the production floor.
Follow all safety protocols, housekeeping, utilize appropriate safety equipment and PPE. Reports safety issues and improvements proactively to Team Captain or direct supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required.
Manufacturing experience in a Medical Device environment preferred.
Understanding of Good Manufacturing and good Documentation practices a plus.
